title: Verify: Implement RESTful API Hardening and Versioning
description:
Run automated tests for task T-069.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Ensure all API endpoints follow RESTful conventions, use consistent error response format, support pagination, and are versioned under /api/v1. Enable OpenAPI auto-generation.
Criteria:
- All endpoints use /api/v1 prefix
- Consistent error format returned
- Pagination on list endpoints
- OpenAPI spec available
